content: On July 27, 1999, the Atlanta Braves celebrated a significant milestone as they defeated the Philadelphia Phillies 11-2 at Turner Field. This victory marked the team's 10,000th win, making them the first franchise in Major League Baseball history to reach this impressive milestone. The game featured a strong performance from pitcher Kevin Millwood, who contributed to the win with his solid outing, further solidifying the Braves' reputation as a dominant force in baseball during the 1990s.
